A wristwatch can be used as a makeshift compass by using the hour markers on the face to estimate the direction of the sun or stars.
Attach a small LED light to the watch face and use it as a makeshift flashlight. This can be especially useful in a power outage or during a camping trip.
Utilize the watch as a makeshift alarm clock by attaching a small bell or whistle to the band and setting the alarm to ring at a specific time.
As a conversation starter, use the watch as a conversation piece by decorating it with small, colorful stickers or magnets.
For those who enjoy collecting rare or vintage items, consider using the watch as a display piece in a shadow box or on a shelf.
